title: Why Chatbots like ChatGPT Weren’t Invented in China
description: The state’s hardening censorship and heavier hand have held back its tech industry; so has entrepreneurs’ reluctance to invest for the long term. It wasn’t always that way.

title: Bing’s Chatbot Declares its Love and Elon Musk Rewrites the Twitter Algorithm
description: Then, online ads have gotten bad — and that might be OK.
